statements: SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_reports;
SELECT report_id, industry_name, company_name FROM augmented_reality_reports;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_reports WHERE industry_name='Retail';
SELECT report_id, report_date, adoption_rate FROM augmented_reality_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, impact_score FROM augmented_reality_reports WHERE impact_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_reports WHERE industry_name = 'Education';
SELECT report_id, company_name, impact_score FROM augmented_reality_reports WHERE impact_score > 0.5 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(adoption_rate) AS average_adoption_rate, industry_name FROM augmented_reality_reports GROUP BY industry_name HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 2 ORDER BY average_adoption_rate DESC;
SELECT company_name, report_date, impact_score FROM augmented_reality_reports WHERE adoption_rate BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY impact_score ASC, report_date DESC;

SELECT report_id, industry_name, company_name, report_date, impact_score, report_description FROM augmented_reality_reports WHERE industry_name = 'Retail' OR industry_name = 'Healthcare' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM AdoptionReports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT industry_name, adoption_rate FROM AdoptionReports WHERE report_date = '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_id, industry_name, adoption_rate FROM AdoptionReports WHERE adoption_rate > 50 ORDER BY adoption_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImpactReports WHERE industry_name = 'Technology' AND impact_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM AdoptionReports WHERE industry_name LIKE 'He%' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM AdoptionReports WHERE adoption_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_id, industry_name, adoption_rate FROM AdoptionReports WHERE industry_name = 'Technology' ORDER BY adoption_rate DESC;
SELECT industry_name, AVG(adoption_rate) AS avg_adoption_rate FROM AdoptionReports GROUP BY industry_name HAVING avg_adoption_rate > 0.3 ORDER BY avg_adoption_rate DESC;
SELECT industry_name, report_date FROM AdoptionReports UNION SELECT industry_name, report_date FROM ImpactReports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ImpactReports WHERE impact_level = 'High' ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM adoption_reports;
SELECT industry, adoption_rate FROM adoption_reports WHERE impact_level = 'High';
SELECT industry_name, industry_description FROM industry_details ORDER BY industry_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_technologies WHERE year_of_release > 2010 ORDER BY year_of_release ASC;
SELECT ar_company FROM ar_technologies WHERE ar_tech_name LIKE '%VR%' AND year_of_release BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM adoption_reports WHERE industry = 'IT' ORDER BY adoption_rate DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT industry, adoption_rate FROM adoption_reports WHERE impact_level = 'High'
SELECT ar_tech_name, ar_company FROM ar_technologies WHERE year_of_release > 2015 ORDER BY ar_tech_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT ar_tech_name, ar_company, year_of_release FROM ar_technologies WHERE ar_company = 'Apple' OR ar_company = 'Google'
SELECT ir.industry_name, ar.ar_tech_name FROM industry_details ir INNER JOIN ar_technologies ar ON ir.industry_id = ar.ar_tech_id ORDER BY ir.industry_name ASC
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_technologies;
SELECT technology_name, adoption_rate FROM augmented_reality_technologies WHERE industry_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM industries ORDER BY industry_name DESC;
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM reports WHERE industry_id = '67890';
SELECT id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_technologies WHERE industry_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT technology_name, adoption_rate FROM augmented_reality_technologies WHERE adoption_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY adoption_rate DESC;
SELECT impact_description FROM augmented_reality_technologies WHERE technology_name LIKE 'AR%' AND industry_id IN (SELECT id FROM industries WHERE industry_name = 'Retail');
SELECT * FROM reports r JOIN industries i ON r.industry_id = i.id WHERE i.industry_name = 'Healthcare' AND r.report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT u.username, r.report_title, r.report_date FROM users u JOIN reports r ON u.id = r.industry_id WHERE u.role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM Industry;
SELECT industry_name, industry_id FROM Industry ORDER BY industry_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Company WHERE industry_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT company_name, industry_name FROM Company INNER JOIN Industry ON Company.industry_id = Industry.industry_id;
SELECT * FROM Impact_Reports WHERE impact_rating > 4 ORDER BY impact_rating DESC, report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Industry WHERE industry_name = 'IT Services';
SELECT company_name, industry_name FROM Company INNER JOIN Industry ON Company.industry_id = Industry.industry_id;
SELECT DISTINCT technology_name FROM AR_Technologies WHERE technology_version LIKE 'v1%';

SELECT Company.company_name, Impact_Reports.impact_description FROM Company INNER JOIN AR_Technologies ON Company.company_id = AR_Technologies.company_id INNER JOIN Impact_Reports ON AR_Technologies.technology_id = Impact_Reports.record_id WHERE Impact_Reports.impact_rating > 3;
SELECT industry_name, COUNT(*) AS company_count FROM Company INNER JOIN Industry ON Company.industry_id = Industry.industry_id GROUP BY industry_name ORDER BY company_count DESC;
